alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 10:48AM EST until January 04 at 12:35AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, several roads are impassable in and around Clay City. Some homes are flooded in low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EST Sunday was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.6 feet by this evening. It will then fall below flood stage by Monday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM.
